snippet: To cap off an extended stay in New Zealand with her family, Miranda Kerr gives Wellington a whirl in fall’s white shirts and strappy flats. And this time her movie-star husband is behind the camera.
abstract: Model Miranda Kerr, who visited New Zealand at age 18, returns to the country to enjoy seven months of a simpler life reminiscent of her pre-fame days.
lead_paragraph: To cap off an extended stay in New Zealand with her family, Miranda Kerr gives Wellington a whirl in fall’s white shirts and strappy flats. And this time her movie-star husband is behind the camera.
